message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really enjoy it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $135. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I really appreciate it, but I'm only able to go up to $120 for this product.  What do you think?
Bob, I understand your position. While I value this product at more than $120, I'm willing to compromise.  How about $130? This would be a fair price for both of us.
